Docs.param: The stream to load the type description from
Docs.summary: Attempts to load a type description from a stream. In all cases, in the event of a properly formatted stream, even if the type-descriptor is not recognized, the stream will be at the end of that type descriptor. Note that any detected format errors will result in a throw.
Docs.returns: A non-null value if the type descriptor was recognized, or null if it was not

Docs.param: The stream to load the type description and value from

Docs.param: The stream to save the description to
The number of bytes written to the stream, which will be zero if we could not save the stream
Docs.summary: A utility method to save a column type to a stream, if we have a codec for that.
Docs.returns: Returns if have the ability to save this column type. If we do, we write the description to the stream. If we do not, nothing is written to the stream and the stream is not advanced.
